    • setKt

      public Material setKt(double kT)
      "Set the thermal conductivity of the material to the given value." The first line of the function is a comment. Comments are ignored by the compiler. They are used to explain what the code does
      Parameters:
      kT - The transmission coefficient.
      Returns:
      The material itself.
